title: Basic Vinaigrette
tagline: Master this ratio and never buy bottled dressing again.
description: Master this ratio and never buy bottled dressing again.
ingredients: Â½ cup extra virgin olive oil
steps: Whisk vinegar, mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking constantly.
Use immediately or store refrigerated up to 1 week.
notes: The ratio: 3 parts oil to 1 part acid. Adjust to taste.
Mustard is the emulsifier: It helps oil and vinegar stay mixed.
Variations: Swap vinegar for lemon juice. Add honey for sweetness. Use shallot instead of garlic.
